actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of Agriculture should suspend, until April 15, 1983, the imposition of any requirement that amounts be deducted from the proceeds of sales of milk marketed commercially by producers.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of Agriculture should suspend milk producer assessments until April 15, 1983.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of Agriculture should suspend, until April 15, 1983, the imposition of any requirement that amounts be deducted from the proceeds of sales of milk marketed commercially by producers.
